entry.title: RefectoCil Eye Protection Papers EXTRA
entry.summary:
Vendor: Refectocil
Type: Refectocil
Price: 9.95

Extra soft and with special, impenetrable coating RefectoCil Eye protection papers Extra prevent the clients eyelids from unwanted staining. They are easy to handle, fit perfectly and provide optimum skin protection thanks to their special coating.
USAGE:

Apply Refectocil Skin Protection Cream & Eye Mask on the uncoated underside of RefectoCil Eye protection paper EXTRA and ask your client to look upwards. Now softly apply the paper underneath the lower eyelashes right to the edge of the client’s eyelids.

 

THIS ITEM IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNT CODES

Type: Refectocil
Price: 7.00

RefectoCil Micellar Eye Make-up Remover non-oily

Strengthens lashes and attracts eye make-up thanks to micellar technology "magnetically".  It cleans thoroughly – no rubbing! For an ideal tinting result and long-lasting duration use RefectoCil Micellar Eye Make-up Remover before styling the eye-area. Oil-free formula.

Tip:
Use our lash strengthening Micellar Eye Make-up Remover also on clients not wearing any make-up to remove skin lipids and ensure an optimum tinting result.

entry.title: RefectoCil Oxidant 3% (10 Vol) Developer Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Refectocil
Type: Refectocil
Price: 11.95

OXIDANT 3% CREAM

Stabilised cream developer

In addition to the developer RefectoCil Oxidant 3% liquid the new RefectoCil Oxidant 3% cream is now available, a stabilised, cream-based developer for RefectoCil eyelash and eyebrow tints.
Due to its creamy consistency RefectoCil Oxidant 3% cream can conveniently be mixed with the RefectoCil tints to a homogenous paste which can be applied easily to the lashes and eyebrows. The convenient dropping device allows the drops to be dispensed precisely and economically by pressing softly on the plastic body of the bottle. Also, the dispenser guarantees that no impurities can get into the bottle.

Important note: Only the use of RefectoCil Oxidant guarantees the widely known perfect tinting results with RefectoCil tints. Therefore use RefectoCil Eyelash and eyebrow tints always with RefectoCil Oxidant 3% liquid or cream.

Content: 100ml
Sufficient for approximately 200 applications.
Please read the instructions for use!

Lashes: for professional use only!

 

THIS ITEM IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNT CODES

entry.title: RefectoCil Cosmetic Brush (Soft)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Refectocil
Type: Refectocil
Price: 18.85

COSMETIC BRUSH (SOFT)

To apply the colour paste professionally

This high quality cosmetic brush is particularly soft and gentle to the skin. It enables a quick, easy and precise application of the paste to lashes and brows and makes the treatment even more simple.
The flat, straight and particularly elastic bristle of synthetic Taklon enables an exceptionally clean and precise working when tinting eyelashes and eyebrows. Whether sparse brows shall be enhanced, a fine lid line shall be conjured up, or if more volume shall be given to the lashes, with this cosmetic brush also finest detail work becomes possible. The synthetic bristle has an exceptionally long life time, brush and bristle can easily be cleansed with water.

Content: 5 pcs., single packed in plastic sleeves

entry.title: RefectoCil SiliconePads
entry.summary:
Vendor: Refectocil
Type: Refectocil
Price: 29.95

SILICONEPADS

The easy way of eyelash tinting! Fast, simple, safe.

The innovative RefectoCil SiliconePads make eyelash tinting as simple as never before! They facilitate eyelash tinting considerably and increase the profitability in your salon, and the treatment becomes more comfortable for the clients.

The RefectoCil SiliconePads are self-adhesive and anti-slip and the soft high-tech silicone perfectly adjusts to every eye form. The pads are 100% impermeable and can be used up to 100 times. After each application they have to be cleansed with water or liposoluble washing-up liquid, after cleansing they are immediately ready for reuse.

Advantages of the new SiliconePads :
• Protects the skin from tint
• Self-adhesive & anti-slip
• Fits every eye form
• Can be reused up to 100 times
• Extra soft, skin-friendly high-tech silicon with a special surface structure
• Dermatologically and microbiological tested

Content: 2 SiliconePads per unit, 25 pcs. per box

 

THIS ITEM IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNT CODES

entry.title: RefectoCil Cosmetic Brush (Hard)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Refectocil
Type: Refectocil
Price: 18.85

COSMETIC BRUSH (HARD)

To apply the colour paste professionally

With RefectoCil Cosmetic brush you can easily, quickly and precisely apply RefectoCil Eyelash and Eyebrow Tints and in particular the RefectoCil Blonde Brow for eyebrows.
Beautiful eyebrows belong to a perfect look. Whether tinting or bleaching, with this special cosmetic brush you can easily, quickly and precisely apply RefectoCil Eyelash and Eyebrow Tints and in particular the RefectoCil Blonde Brow for eyebrows.
RefectoCil Blonde Brow for eyebrows enables salons, for the first time ever, to lighten eyebrows up to 3 shades. Working similar to bleaching powder for hair, it was developed to meet all regulations applicable for bleaching eyebrows.

The flat, angled and slightly harder synthetic bristle enables a perfect application of the RefectoCil Blonde Brow. For an even bleaching result it is not sufficient to apply the paste superficially, but each hair must be completely covered with the paste from root to tip. The easiest way is first to apply the paste generously in the direction of growth to the eyebrows. Then, by using the cosmetic brush, the paste is being worked into the brows against the direction of growth so that each hair is evenly covered with the paste from root to tip. The cosmetic brush is also suitable for the application of all other RefectoCil Eyelash and Eyebrow Tints. The synthetic bristle has an exceptionally long life time, brush and bristle can easily be cleansed with water.

 

THIS ITEM IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNT CODES

Perfect cosmetic dish for tint-mixing

entry.title: RefectoCil Application Set Mini
entry.summary:
Vendor: Refectocil
Type: Refectocil
Price: 10.00

APPLICATION-SET MINI

Practical set for mixing and applying RefectoCil tints!

The RefectoCil Application Set Mini consists of 5 Mini-Tinting Dishes and 5 Application Sticks with rills. The Tinting Dish is used for mixing the paste for eyelash and eyebrow tinting. It is small, lightweight, unbreakable and its plain surface can be cleaned easily. The shape allows an easy and safe deposit of the Application Stick.

The Application Sticks in this set differ from the conventional ones by having rills. When applying the tint the hairs are being separated by the rills and this allows the tinting paste to enclose each hair optimally. A beautiful and equal tinting result is guaranteed.

Content:
5 pcs. Mini-Tinting Dishes & 5 pcs. Application Sticks

 

THIS ITEM IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNT CODES

entry.title: Refectocil Eyebrow and Eyelash Tint No. 4 CHESTNUT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Refectocil
Type: Refectocil
Price: 12.95

EYEBROW AND EYELASH TINT NO. 4 CHESTNUT

Charming Chestnut – For a harmonious look!

NEW AND IMPROVED FORMULA: The new and optimized formula offers two essential advantages:

1. RefectoCil No. 4 chestnut is now ready to mix with every other RefectoCil Colour and therefore offers a multitude of new tinting opportunities.
2. The shorter application time of only 10 minutes allows working even more efficiently.

Whether chestnut, mahogany or copper, red is at present the trendy hair colour. An absolute MUST for a harmonious look is the perfect colour match of eyebrows and hair! For those who like, even the eyelashes can be tinted accordingly. In order to do so, use the new RefectoCil No. 4 chestnut. With RefectoCil No. 4 chestnut you will receive a wonderful result in a red-brown tone of chestnut. The tinting result will be more intensive the lighter the natural hair colour is. When used on light blonde to light brown hair, the result will be very intense. From medium brown hair on the result will be more discreet and a beautiful, soft chestnut lustre will appear. The tint is smudge- and waterproof and lasts up to 6 weeks.

For a more intense colour effect lighten the eyebrows beforehand with RefectoCil Blonde Brow.

Tip: The most beautiful results will be obtained with regular use, as tint will penetrate deeper into the hair and with each application the hair will be tinted more intensely and more durably. Please read the instructions for use!

Content: 15 ml
Sufficient for approximately 30 applications.
Please read the instructions for use.

 

THIS ITEM IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNT CODES

entry.title: Refectocil Eyebrow and Eyelash Tint No. 3.1 LIGHT BROWN
entry.summary:
Vendor: Refectocil
Type: Refectocil
Price: 12.95

EYEBROW AND EYELASH TINT NO. 3.1 LIGHT BROWN

Luscious Light Brown – For subtle enhancement!

RefectoCil No. 3.1 light brown is suitable to discreetly emphasize light blonde to light brown eyelashes and eyebrows. This colour tone is mainly preferred by blond clients who like a discreet and naturally looking enhancement of their eyebrows.

With RefectoCil you will always achieve a beautiful, long-lasting and intensive tinting result on eyelashes and eyebrows. Tinted lashes appear clearly longer and more voluminous, as the tinting accentuates the full length of the lashes faded by sun and water. The tint highlights bright and lengthens short lashes; it adds gloss and shine to dull hairs and freshens already greying lashes and brows. Tinted eyebrows appear better defined and more colour intensive. Your eyes appear livelier and expressive – even without make-up. The tint is absolutely smudge- and waterproof and lasts up to 6 weeks.

Tip: By mixing RefectoCil No.3.1 light brown with RefectoCil No. 3 natural brown you can easily obtain any intermediate tone your client may wish!

Content: 15 ml
Sufficient for approximately 30 applications.
Please read the instructions for use.

 

THIS ITEM IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNT CODES

entry.title: Refectocil Eyebrow and Eyelash Tint No. 2.1 DEEP BLUE
entry.summary:
Vendor: Refectocil
Type: Refectocil
Price: 12.95

EYEBROW AND EYELASH TINT NO. 2.1 DEEP BLUE

Dazzling Deep Blue – Something special for your eyelashes!

RefectoCil No. 2.1 deep blue is an eyelash tint, only effective for women with light blonde to blonde lashes. Unlike RefectoCil No. 2 blue black the shade No. 2.1 deep blue contains a higher blue portion, which appears the more intensive the brighter the natural hair colour is. This eyelash tint suits perfectly to clients with blue eyes or those who like blue or violet eye make-up. RefectoCil No. 2.1 deep blue makes your eye make-up a real highlight!

With RefectoCil you will always achieve a beautiful, long-lasting and intensive tinting result on eyelashes and eyebrows. Tinted lashes appear clearly longer and more voluminous, as the tinting accentuates the full length of the lashes faded by sun and water. The tint highlights bright and lengthens short lashes; it adds gloss and shine to dull hairs and freshens already greying lashes and brows. Your eyes appear livelier and expressive – even without make-up. The tint is absolutely smudge- and waterproof and lasts up to 6 weeks.

The best result is achieved when applying the tint regularly, because with each tinting the colour will penetrate deeply into the eyelashes leaving them more intensely and durably coloured.

Content: 15 ml
Sufficient for approximately 30 applications.
Please read the instructions for use.
